mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a black and white photograph of a family group with 5 people standing behind a couch where 3 people are seated. An attached handwritten note identifies the subjects as: Rear -- Edward Thomas Wood, Marie Wood Hayes, Pvt Clarence M. Wood, Jr., Bette Jo Wood Swann, Alexander B. Wood; Seated -- Clarence M. Wood, Sr., Nannie E. Wood, Harry Walker Wood.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: At Blandome About 1946 (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Wood, Clarence M. (Clarence Mosby)
Wood, Nannie Elizabeth Walker
Blandome (Lexington, Va.)
